plays.text: Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Simon
Penalty to Tyler Arnason 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Manny Legace
Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Nathan Dempsey 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Roughing Lyle Odelein
Penalty to Lyle Odelein 2 minutes for Roughing Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Kris Draper
Goal scored by Alexei Zhamnov assisted by Kyle Calder and Theo Fleury
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mark Bell
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Chris Simon assisted by Steve Thomas and Andrei Nikolishin
Goal scored by Eric Daze assisted by Mike Eastwood and Sergei Berezin
Penalty to Andrei Nikolishin 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Sean Avery
Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Diving Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Pavel Datsyuk 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Poapst
Penalty to Steve Thomas 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Sean Avery 5 minutes for Fighting Steve Thomas
Penalty to Steve Thomas 5 minutes for Fighting Sean Avery
Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Holding Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Mark Bell assisted by Mike Eastwood and Alexander Karpovtsev
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Lyle Odelein
Penalty to Lyle Odelein 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Lyle Odelein served by Boyd Devereaux
